story.text: (Updates to opening)TOKYO Jan 4 (Reuters) - The Nikkei average rose 0.56 percent on Thursday, the first trading day of 2007, with investors buying exporters such as Toyota Motor Corp. (7203.T) encouraged by a softer yen. The Nikkei was up 96.67 points at 17,322.50 as of 0001 GMT. The broader TOPIX index .TOPX gained 0.66 percent to 1,692.21.
story.title: nikkei up 0 . 56 pct as toyota , exporters gain on yen
